hero.title: Shakisha ubufasha mu mirimo yawe yo mu rugo
hero.subtitle: Huza n'abafasha b'ubuhanga mu Rwanda. Ibiciro byangiza, kwishyura kw'umutekano, n'inyungu z'imibereho kuri buri wese.

services.needHelpDesc: Shakira imirimo yawe yo mu rugo ukabona ubufasha bw'abafasha bemejwe
services.wantToHelpDesc: Shakisha imirimo yo mu rugo mu gace kawe ukayibona ukaborera

helpers.title: Abafasha bari hafi yawe
helpers.noHelpersDesc: Abafasha bazagaragara hano iyo bamaze kwinjira kuri iyi platiforme. Ba wa mbere kwiyandikisha kandi utangire guhuza n'umuryango wawe!

impact.title: Tubaka ejo hazaza heza hamwe
impact.subtitle: Buri gikorwa giteranya akazi gakora mu ngo kandi gutanga inyungu z'imibereho
impact.contributionDesc: 5% ya buri gikorwa cyarangiye byugarijwe ku kigega cy'ubwiteganyirize bw'imibereho cya Rwanda, bifasha gushyira mu mategeko akazi gakora mu ngo no gutanga inyungu kubafasha.

safety.title: Umutekano wawe ni intego yacu nyamukuru
safety.subtitle: Abafasha bose bemejwe kandi imirimo ifite ubwishingizi bwacu

footer.description: Guhuza amazu n'abafasha bizwi mu Rwanda. Ibiciro byangiza, kwishyura kw'umutekano, inyungu z'imibereho.

toasts.signInRequiredDesc: Nyamuneka winjire kugira ngo ushakire umurimo

auth.signInToAccount: Injira kuri konti yawe ya HouseHand
auth.createAccount: Kora konti yawe kugira ngo utangire
auth.welcomeToHouseHand: Murakaza neza kuri HouseHand. Ubu ushobora kwinjira ku rubuga rwawe.

findWork.title: Shakisha Akazi nka Mufasha
findWork.subtitle: Injira mu muryango w'abafasha bizwi kandi utangire kubona amafaranga angiza mu gihe ufasha abaturanyi bawe mu mirimo yo mu rugo.
findWork.readyToWork: Ubu witeguye gushakisha amahirwe yo gukora.
findWork.createProfile: Kora umwirondoro wawe w'umufasha uyu munsi

benefits.flexibleScheduleDesc: Kora igihe ushaka, hitamo imirimo ihuza n'igihe cyawe
benefits.fairCompensationDesc: Bona amafaranga menshi hamwe n'ibiciro bigaragara
benefits.workLocallyDesc: Shakisha imirimo mu gace kawe no mu muryango wawe

getHelp.title: Bona Ubufasha mu Mirimo Yawe
getHelp.subtitle: Huza n'abafasha bizwi mu gace kawe ku mirimo yose yo mu rugo. Kuva gusukura kugeza ku mirimo y'akarima, dufite byose.
getHelp.readyToPost: Ubu witeguye gushakira imirimo no kubona ubufasha.
getHelp.accessAccount: Injira kuri konti yawe kugira ngo ushakire imirimo
getHelp.createAccountToStart: Kora konti yawe kugira ngo utangire kubona ubufasha
getHelp.needHelpFirstTime: Ukeneye ubufasha ku nshuro ya mbere?

benefits.satisfactionGuaranteeDesc: Kugumya kwawe kwemezwa cyangwa amafaranga yawe agaruke

password.length: Ijambo ry'ibanga rigomba kuba rifite inyuguti 8 cyangwa zirenga
password.uppercase: Ijambo ry'ibanga rigomba kuba rifite inyuguti nkuru
password.lowercase: Ijambo ry'ibanga rigomba kuba rifite inyuguti ntoya
password.number: Ijambo ry'ibanga rigomba kuba rifite imibare

budget.min: Igiciro ntikigomba kuba kiri munsi ya zeru
budget.max: Igiciro ntarengwa ntikigomba kuba kiri munsi y'igiciro fatizo
